name: trayio-connector-sdk-nodejs
description: Software Development Kit (SDK) for writing tray.io connectors

scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run inspect
scripts.posttest: (istanbul check-coverage --statements 90 --branches 90 --functions 100 --lines 90 && rm -rf coverage) || echo Look at 'coverage/lcov-report/index.html' to find out more

author: Alistair Russell <ali@tray.io>
